about_the_game:
In the game "Anime Friends," players are transported to a world of flying islands and have the opportunity to learn how to build their own houses, farms, and make new friends.

As the player progresses through the game, they will learn how to gather resources and use them to construct their own homes and farms. They will also have the chance to meet and interact with a variety of characters, including other humans and fantastical creatures.



Throughout their journey, the player will have the opportunity to learn how to fly on their dragon friend, using their skills and abilities to navigate through the skies and reach new destinations.


"Anime Friends" is a fun and exciting game that combines elements of simulation, exploration, and role-playing, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in a world of adventure and friendship.



Features

Building and farming: Gather resources and use them to construct their own houses and farms.

Exploration: Fly on your dragon companion and explore the various flying islands in the game world.

Role-playing: Iinteract with a variety of characters and participate in events and competitions.

Questing: Players can embark on a series of quests and adventures as they search for the Seeds of Life.

Combat: Players can defend themselves as they explore the game world.

Party: Players can throw a grand party on the restored island to celebrate their accomplishments and share their success with their friends.

Be ready and explore a new sim world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ntel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Upcoming life sim with flying dragons and a farming system. Meet new friends, start your farm, ride on dragons and get new adventures in flying islands in the world of Anime Friends! Be ready and explore a new sim world!
